component.name: libogg
component.summary: Ogg is a free, open standard container format maintained by the Xiph.Org Foundation. libogg is the Xiph.Org Foundation's reference implementation. The creators of the Ogg format state that it is unrestricted by software patents and is designed to provide for efficient streaming and manipulation of high quality digital multimedia. The Ogg container format can multiplex a number of independent streams for audio, video, text (such as subtitles), and metadata.
